description:
Are you struggling to take your business to the next level?

Are you feeling overwhelmed with the need to market your business but don’t know how?

Have you read countless marketing books but find the task of creating a marketing plan too complicated?

Are you scattering your energy and wasting money trying every new marketing fad?

Are you spending time on marketing activities that you hate?

Are you struggling to figure out whom to market your services too?

Do you believe that creating a focused marketing plan will lead you to the success that you want to achieve in your business?

If you answered yes to any of these questions then this class if for you.

This course is designed help you create a focused kick ass marketing plan.

During this course, you will learn:

  • How to create marketing goals for your business
  • How to analyze your current business situation
  • How to determine the difference between your current situation and your marketing goals
  • How to create objectives to meet your goals
  • What to think about when choosing your target market
  • Defining your market when targeting businesses
  • How to determine your target market
  • The components of consumer target marketing
  • How to create ideal client profile/buyer personas
  • How to create a targeted at your ideal customers
  • Understanding your buyer personas goals, challenges and how you can help them
  • Understanding how your buyer persona feels, common objections and how to create a message that speaks directly to them
  • How to understand and map your customers journey
  • Creating scenarios to understand your customers journey
  • How to create a strategies to meet your objectives
  • How to create tactics to help you achieve your achieve your strategies
  • How to create a implementation timeline for your marketing activities
  • How to make sure that you are on track to meet your goals by monitoring and measuring your marketing activities
  • How to create a marketing budget

I am going to walk you through what you need to know to create a marketing plan by teaching you the elements of an easy yet powerful marketing plan and I will also create a sample marketing plan for a fictitious “Career Coaching Firm” to help guide you along the way.

I have provided planning sheets to create your plan, timeline and budget sheets that you can customize. I have also provided a completed sample marketing plan.

At the conclusion of this course you will have completed a marketing plan that is tailored to your business, ready to implement and kick ass marketing your business.
title: Learn How to Create a Marketing Plan in 9 Easy Steps
